frontend.name: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Experienced in modern frontend frameworks like React, Next.js and TypeScript. Creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces with a focus on performance and accessibility.

backend.name: Backend Development
backend.description: Building scalable server-side applications using Node.js, Express, Supabase and working with various databases. Experienced in API development and system architecture.

automation.name: Workflow Automation
automation.description: Expertise in n8n to create powerful automated workflows, integrating various services and APIs to optimize business processes and increase productivity.

n8n_email.title: Email Automation with n8n
n8n_email.description: n8n workflow for automated and intelligent email management with categorization and labeling.
n8n_email.details: Development of an n8n workflow to automate email management. The system automatically analyzes, categorizes and labels incoming emails, creating new labels if necessary. A solution to optimize productivity and maintain an organized inbox.
features: Classification based on content and sender

devfest.title: DevFest Hackathon – AI & Circular Economy
devfest.description: Frontend of an AI solution for sustainable resource management, as part of the DevFest Hackathon.
devfest.details: Development of the front-end of an eco-responsible platform integrating AI, allowing users to track and improve their environmental impact. Created during the DevFest Hackathon with a modern UI/UX approach.
features: Intuitive interface to visualize ecological impact
Modular architecture adapted to AI APIs

welia.title: HIU Hackathon – Welia, AI for positive actions
welia.description: Front-end application to promote daily positive actions, gamified and automated by AI.
welia.details: I participated in the front-end development of Welia, an app that automates the recognition of positive behaviors via AI scoring mechanisms. Project presented during the Inter-University Hackathon (HIU).
features: Tracking positive actions via a dynamic interface
Automated points and rewards with AI logic

restaurant_app.title: Tech Watch – Restaurant Booking App
restaurant_app.description: Table booking application for customers and management for restaurateurs.
restaurant_app.details: Tech watch project on an intuitive app allowing customers to easily book a table and restaurateurs to manage their bookings in real-time via a polished interface.
features: Advanced filters (date, time, number of people)
